main_task: Gather valid information on options supported for deactivating OD-SSB transmission from UE perspective.

task_1.content: Research the 3GPP standards related to options for deactivating OD-SSB transmission from the UE perspective.
task_1.agent_role_description: The agent will analyze 3GPP documentation to extract relevant standards that outline the deactivation options for OD-SSB from the UE perspective.
local_constraints: Focus on 3GPP specifications published after 2020 that mention OD-SSB.

task_2.content: Investigate communication technologies that facilitate OD-SSB deactivation.
task_2.agent_role_description: The agent will explore various communication technologies that allow for the deactivation of OD-SSB from the UE perspective, detailing how these technologies function.
local_constraints: Look for technologies that have been implemented in commercial networks.

task_3.content: Analyze the impact of OD-SSB deactivation on network performance.
task_3.agent_role_description: The agent will evaluate how the deactivation of OD-SSB affects overall network performance metrics such as latency, throughput, and user experience.
local_constraints: Focus on performance studies conducted in the last two years.

task_4.content: Examine policy and regulatory considerations for OD-SSB deactivation.
task_4.agent_role_description: The agent will investigate any policies or regulations that govern the implementation of OD-SSB deactivation options from the perspective of telecommunications regulations.
local_constraints: Identify regulations that have been enacted or updated in the last year.
